document.full_text: job scarcity in some communities and a backlog of foreclosed properties continue to inhibit the u.s. economy's recovery, a top fed official said on tuesday.
document.title: fed's duke: jobs, housing still weigh on recovery
lines_and_colors: job scarcity in some communities and a backlog of foreclosed properties continue to inhibit the u.s. economy's recovery, a top fed official said on tuesday.
